seasonalDishes.name: Sarson Ka Saag
seasonalDishes.description: A popular Punjabi dish made with mustard greens, best enjoyed with makki ki roti.

seasonalDishes.name: Makki Ki Roti
seasonalDishes.description: Cornmeal flatbread, typically served with sarson ka saag in winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Gajar Ka Halwa
seasonalDishes.description: Sweet dessert made from grated carrots, milk, and ghee, commonly served in winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Undhiyu
seasonalDishes.description: A mixed vegetable Gujarati dish cooked with seasonal winter vegetables and spices.

seasonalDishes.name: Nolen Gurer Sandesh
seasonalDishes.description: A Bengali dessert made with date palm jaggery, popular during winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Paya Soup
seasonalDishes.description: A hearty soup made with goat legs, often enjoyed for warmth during winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Bajra Khichdi
seasonalDishes.description: A comforting khichdi made with pearl millet and moong dal, perfect for cold nights.

seasonalDishes.name: Tilgul Ladoo
seasonalDishes.description: Ladoos made from sesame seeds and jaggery, popular during Makar Sankranti.

seasonalDishes.name: Rogan Josh
seasonalDishes.description: A flavorful lamb curry, seasoned with spices to warm you up in winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Doodh Jalebi
seasonalDishes.description: Hot milk served with fresh, crispy jalebis, commonly enjoyed in winter evenings.

seasonalDishes.name: Litti Chokha
seasonalDishes.description: A traditional Bihari dish of stuffed dough balls served with mashed vegetables.

seasonalDishes.name: Til Ke Ladoo
seasonalDishes.description: Sweet sesame balls made with jaggery, providing warmth during winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Chikki
seasonalDishes.description: A brittle sweet made from jaggery and peanuts, a favorite winter treat.

seasonalDishes.name: Patrode
seasonalDishes.description: Steamed colocasia leaves layered with a spiced batter, popular in winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Kanji
seasonalDishes.description: A tangy fermented drink made from black carrots, commonly served in winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Malai Makhan
seasonalDishes.description: A light, creamy dessert made from milk froth and saffron, enjoyed in winter.

seasonalDishes.name: Methi Thepla
seasonalDishes.description: Fenugreek flatbreads served with yogurt, perfect for a winter breakfast.

seasonalDishes.name: Kharzi Pulao
seasonalDishes.description: A warming rice dish made with mixed spices and vegetables.

seasonalDishes.name: Harira
seasonalDishes.description: A warm milk and dry fruit drink, popular in Kashmir to combat the winter cold.

seasonalDishes.name: Lauki Halwa
seasonalDishes.description: A warm, delicious dessert made from grated bottle gourd and milk.
